item.title: Multilingual and i18n
item.description: Learn theme is fully compatible with Hugo multilingual mode. It provides: Translation strings for default values (English and French). Feel free to contribute ! Automatic menu generation from multilingual content In-browser language switching Basic configuration After learning how Hugo handle multilingual websites, define your languages in your config.toml file. For example with current French and English website. # English is the default language defaultContentLanguage = "en" # Force to have /en/my-page and /fr/my-page routes, even for default language.
